chunks.title: How to Create Payment QR Codes
chunks.body: Complete guide for creating payment QR codes with NYLA. Perfect for receiving payments in person or sharing payment links.
chunks.summary_en: Step-by-step guide for creating payment QR codes for easy token receiving via mobile scanning.
chunks.summary_zh: 创建支付二维码的分步指南，便于通过移动设备扫描接收代币。

steps.details: Navigate to NYLAGo and click the 'Receive' tab to access QR code generation tools.
Choose which blockchain network for the payment (Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand). This determines which tokens can be received.
Connect your wallet extension (Phantom/MetaMask/Pera) to display your receiving address in the QR code.
Specify exact amount if you want a pre-filled payment request. Leave blank for flexible amount QR code.
Choose specific token (SOL, ETH, USDC, etc.) if you want to request a particular token type.
Click the generate button to create your payment QR code with your wallet address and optional amount/token.
Save the QR code image to your device or display it on screen for others to scan.
Scan with a QR reader or wallet app to verify it contains correct payment information.

pitfalls.issue: QR code too small to scan
pitfalls.solution: Increase screen brightness and zoom in on QR code. Ensure clear display without glare.
Reconnect your wallet and regenerate the QR code. Always verify address matches your wallet.
Some wallets don't support amount pre-filling. Recipients may need to enter amount manually.
Check wallet connection and network selection. Try refreshing the page and reconnecting wallet.
Ensure good lighting, steady hands, and proper distance. Try different QR scanner apps.

prerequisites: Understanding of which network to use
tips: Test QR codes before sharing with others
Save QR code image for reuse at events
Include amount for exact payment requests
